import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Descargar recibo PDF REDEC"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/redec/consent_actions/{token}/download_receipt"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Descarga el recibo PDF de una acción de consentimiento REDEC.
El PDF incluye verificación de integridad mediante hash SHA256.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"token","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Token del consent action","schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"consact_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"PDF del recibo REDEC","content":{"application/pdf":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}},"401":{"description":"Error de autenticación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"authentication_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":401},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"We could not authenticate your credentials. Please check the documentation at https://docs.soyio.id"}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Recibo no disponible","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"invalid_request_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Resource not found"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":404},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"Couldn't find <resource> with id '<id>'. Please check your request and try again"}},"title":"NotFoundErrorSchema"},"example":{"type":"invalid_request_error","title":"Resource not found","status":404,"detail":"Receipt PDF not available yet"}}}},"422":{"description":"Fallo en verificación de integridad","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"invalid_request_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unprocessable entity"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":422},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"PDF integrity check failed"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
